params._asset: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

returns.pending: REWARD_TOKEN reward for a given user.

params.to: The address of the user whose information will be cleared

rewardsBetweenBlocks(uint256,uint256).details: returns total amount of rewards allocated to the all pools on the rage (startBlock, endBlock]      i.e. excluding startBlock but including endBlock

params._asset: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

returns.pool: Returns the pool that was updated.

totalAllocPoint.details: Total allocation points. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools. The good practice, to always keep this variable is equal 1000.

add(uint256,address).notice: Add a new reward  pool. Can only be called by the owner. DO NOT add the same LP token more than once.

decreaseAmount(address,address,uint256).notice: Analogues to MVC2 Withdraw method, that can be called only by trusted address that is trusted to honestly calc how many "virtual" tokens have to be allocated for each user.

harvest(address,address).notice: Harvest proceeds for transaction sender to `to`.

increaseAmount(address,address,uint256).notice: analogues to MCV2 Deposit method, but can be called only by trusted address

pendingSushi(address,address).notice: View function to see pending REWARD_TOKEN on frontend.

poolInfo(address).notice: Info of each MCV2 pool. PoolInfo memory pool = poolInfo[_pid]

resetAmount(address,address).notice: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.

set(address,uint256).notice: Update the given pool's REWARD_TOKEN allocation point. Can only be called by the owner.

updateAllPools().notice: Update reward variables for all pools. Be careful of gas spending!

updatePool(address).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool.

userInfo(address,address).notice: Info of each user that stakes tokens. userInfo[_asset][_user]

userdoc.notice: This contract is based on MVC2, but uses "virtual" balances instead of storing real ERC20 tokens and uses address of this assets instead of pid. Rewards that are distributed have to be deposited using refillReward(uint256 amount, uint64 endBlock)
